snippet.title: NBA 2K22 - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the trailer for NBA 2K22, coming to PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One on September 10, 2021.

#IGN #Gaming #NBA2K22
